name: cucumber-ts-starter
description: Starter project to write and debug cucumber-js features in TypeScript language

scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run format && npm run lint && tsc && npm run cucumber-check
scripts.cucumber-check: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --dry-run --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format summary --format progress --format progress-bar  --publish-quiet
scripts.cucumber: FORCE_COLOR=0 node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}"  --format html:reports/report.html --format summary --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format cucumber-console-formatter --publish-quiet
scripts.snippets: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --dry-run --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format snippets  --publish-quiet
scripts.steps-usage: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --dry-run --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format usage  --publish-quiet
